Name: Reborn
About the game: Reborn is the best place to create and discover stunning 3D experiences in VR, AR and MR. You can join a live vtuber performance with hundreds of fans at the same time in VR. You can meet with friends to build and enjoy an immersive game world. Or you can cooperate with the most creative community members to create a brand-new experience in VR, no matter it is a new musical instrument, interactive storytelling, or even a virtual film production! You’ll find an endless stream of virtual experiences that feel personalized just for you. Reborn is dedicated to helping every talented content creator, world crafter, virtual musician, etc be seen by the world, grow involved fans network, and monetize. You shine and amaze the world with your creativity and talents, not by who you are in real life and how others judge you. That’s reborn ;) - Reborn supports Full Body Tracking, including HTC Vive trackers, and Tundra trackers. Improved IK is also included for better dancing motion. - Support Blender plugin, Unity SDK. Enable to build and upload functional props or even multiplayer games directly in Blender or Unity. - Support optimized networking, able to host hundreds of thousands of fans at the same time for vtuber livestream in VR. - Support motion record, MMD upload and realtime multi-person collaboration. Join our burgeoning community! Even though we are still early, we want to build a good product and are devoted to contributing to the industry. Your suggestions value a lot! We hold strong faith in virtual reality, and let's build truly creative virtual experiences together!
